args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- The real 2√ó2 matrix representing the ‚Ñù-linear map z ‚Ü¶ Œæ*z + Œ∂*conj z
    with respect to the real basis (1, I).  We encode the matrix by its entries
    (row and column indexed by `Fin 2` with `0` ‚Ü¶ `1`, `1` ‚Ü¶ `i`). -/
def M_of (Œæ Œ∂ : ‚ÑÇ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù :=
  fun (i j : Fin 2) =>
    match i.val, j.val with
    | 0, 0 => (Œæ.re + Œ∂.re)
    | 0, 1 => - (Œæ.im - Œ∂.im)
    | 1, 0 => (Œæ.im + Œ∂.im)
    | 1, 1 => (Œæ.re - Œ∂.re)
    | _, _ => 0

/-- For the ‚Ñù-linear map f(z) = Œæ z + Œ∂ conj(z) its real 2√ó2 determinant equals
    |Œæ|^2 - |Œ∂|^2. -/
theorem det_M_of (Œæ Œ∂ : ‚ÑÇ) : Matrix.det (M_of Œæ Œ∂) = (Complex.abs Œæ) ^ 2 - (Complex.abs Œ∂) ^ 2 := by sorry
